name: 曾恕銘
objective: 本課程介紹無線傳輸技術的基礎和最新發展，內容包含訊號與系統基礎，數位通訊基礎，行動通訊基礎，CDMA/SCMA for B5G，資料偵測和干擾消除，MIMO (spatial multiplexing/spatial transmit diversity/beamforming)，OFDMA，4G MIMO傳輸模式/NOMA(non-orthogonal multiple access) for B5G，貝氏統計/偵測與估計(感知無線電 追蹤預測物體軌跡)-資料探勘和機器學習的一種。
schedule:
1.　　Signals and linear systems
2.  Digital communications (including random processes, linear algebra)
3.　　Mobile communication fundamentals (cellular system, propagation model, diversity)
4.　　CDMA/SCMA for B5G
5.　　Data detection/interference cancellation for CDMA etc.
6.　　MIMO(Spatial Multiplexing/MU-MIMO/STBC/distributed STBC/beamforming) 
7.　　OFDM(A) (principle/synchronization/channel estimation/power allocation)
8.　　4G Overview/MIMO Modes/Link Adaption, 5G overview, B5G NOMA (Non-orthogonal multiple access)
9. 　　Baysian statistics/Estimation,and detection: a subset of data mining and machine learning
scorePolicy:
Course participation: 20%
Exam: 40% 
Oral report (a course-related paper): 40%
materials:
(4G MIMO modes Link Adaption) Houman Zarrinkoub, Understanding LTE with MATLAB: From Mathematical Modeling to Simulation and Prototyping, Wiley, 2014, ch6-7
(行動通訊基礎)Stuber, Mobile Communications, Kluwer, 2001, ch. 1,2,6
(5G) 5G Technologies and Advances, Part I:5G New Radio – An Overview, EASITC 2018 Tutorial A.
(5G) A. Ly and Y. -D. Yao, "A review of deep learning in 5G research: channel coding, massive MIMO, multiple access, resource allocation, and network security," IEEE Open Journal of the Communications Society, vol. 2, pp. 396-408, 2021,
(5G) Makki, Behrooz, et al. "A survey of NOMA: Current status and open research challenges," IEEE Open Journal of the Communications Society, vol. 1, pp. 179-189, 2020.
(5G)中華電信學院 5G理論與生活實際體驗
